text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews The simple truth about covid-19 that Trump doesn't understand (or care about) is that if he encouraged everyone to wear a mask, and led by example by wearing one himself, far fewer Americans would get sick and die. This, in turn, would help the U.S. economy.
